column5: got to the lake around 7 in the morning, was on the canoe at 7:30 caught a lm bass after 20 minutes , then it was all pikes after that, the two of us got 8 pikes and a bass, no monster tho, ranges from a pounds to 5 pounds  on our way     here's a litttle guy     gonna let them go so they could grow bigger =D     and um..of course...the sun burn..
yeaa i thought i had it in my bag..but no
Nice haha, my arms are glowing also lol. Get that spray sunscreen, it's suppose to work well
I like the pic from inside the vehicle...  I got a "farmers tan " too this weekend,  forgot the sunscreen
my forearms and shins are burned pretty good, seems that the 4 times i applied sunscreen to the neck/face/ears i forgot those parts...ooops
